data.actual_result: The code block gets overlapped by the name of the person who mentioned you.
data.expected_result: The code block appears a line under the name, to prevent the mentioner's name from overlapping the code block.
data.short_description: Sending a Code Block and ending the message with a mention causes the code block to underlap the mentioner's name.
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message with a code block (specifically 3 backticks) - Exit the code block and mention the user at the bottom of the message.
